text: I don't think people are fools, and I think they deserve a good attitude and smart entertainment.
author: Tatyana Tolstaya

text: Hollywood's a very weird place. I think there's less of everything except for attitude.
author: Dean Cain

text: My agent says that I'm a 'repeat business guy.' If you hire me to come do a movie, I'll be on time, know all my material, be ready to go, have a good attitude. I'm here to work, so I get hired over and over again by the same producers. If you just be a team player on set you can work so much more often.
author: Dean Cain

text: What do you mean by faith? Is faith enough for Man? Should he be satisfied with faith alone? Is there no way of finding out the truth? Is the attitude of faith, of believing in something for which there can be no more than philosophic proof, the true mark of a Christian?
author: Clifford D. Simak
